original_text: I will also punish the prophet himself if he gives a false message. I, the Lord, have deceived him to show that he is a fool. And I will punish him. I will remove him from among my people, Israel's people.
korean_text: 만일 선지자가 유혹을 받고 말을 하면 나 여호와가 그 선지자를 유혹을 받게 하였음이거니와 내가 손을 펴서 내 백성 이스라엘 가운데에서 그를 멸할 것이라

sentences.original_text: I will also punish the prophet himself
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 그 선지자 자신을 벌할 것이다

sentences.original_text: if he gives a false message
I, the Lord, have deceived him
to show that he is a fool
I will remove him from among my people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그를 내 백성 중에서 제거할 것이다
